name: Laserboy
description:
Guide Buddy through 13 top-down 2D pixel-perfect levels filled with destructible objects, forbidden secrets, and a cast of friendly and not-so-friendly characters. The catch? Buddy can't control the laser beam that shoots out of his eye every 5 seconds. Explore a secret facility filled with dangers to discover the truth about everything.

Additional information: LASERBOY is the miraculous remaster of the iconic video game by Catfun Corp, originally created for the Funvision Entertainment System. Thought until recently to have been forever lost to time, LASERBOY has been painstakingly rebuilt and faithfully recreated from the ground up by an expert team of digital archaeologists at Universal Entities using fragments of art and code found in the wreckage of [REDACTED]. A story of lore, lasers, and [REDACTED]. Music by Germany's pop sensation: Lenni Revenge.


A short, experimental game that began life as a simple game jam idea
We’re a small, fledgling, but enthusiastic team of three, and this is our first serious game. Our goal with Laserboy was to create something compact but fun to build and mainly fun to play. We also wanted to learn how to work efficiently together and teach ourselves fundamental lessons that will be so important for our future projects.

We’d love you to play Laserboy and hope you find it entertaining and relaxing. Perhaps with a bit of a challenge for those who seek it or a dash of chaos when you need to let loose. There’s no right or wrong way to play: be as cautious as possible or go all-out crazy with your new-found abilities – it’s all good :)

Whether you enjoy Laserboy or not, we’d like to invite you to our Discussions page, say hi, and even share your thoughts. All feedback, comments, and questions are much appreciated.
